contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox political party |country = the Czech Republic |name_english = Republicans of Miroslav Sládek |name_native = Republikáni Miroslava Sládka |party_logo = [[File:A_logo_of_Republicans_of_Miroslav_Sladek.gif|150px]] |leader = [[Miroslav Sládek]] |leader1_title = Chairman |foundation = |colorcode = black |dissolution = |europarl = ''None'' |colours = [[white]], [[red]] and [[blue]] |headquarters = |ideology = [[Nationalism]]<br>[[Euroscepticism]]<br>[[Populism]]<br>[[Antiziganism]] |position = [[Far-right]] |website = }} The '''Republicans of Miroslav Sládek''' ({{lang-cs|Republikáni Miroslava Sládka}}, abbreviated to '''Republikáni''' or '''RMS''') is a tiny political party in the [[Czech Republic]]. They are strongly opposed to the [[European Union|EU]], [[NATO]] and immigration. The party was founded by [[Miroslav Sládek]] as a successor of [[Coalition for Republic - Republican Party of Czechoslovakia]] (SPR-RSČ, ''Sdružení pro republiku - Republikánská strana Československa''). The SPR-RSČ peaked in [[Czech legislative election, 1996]] with 8% of votes but declined since then and in 2001 it was disbanded due to financial irregularities. Sládek, the leader of the SPR-RSČ, immediately set up a new party; to distinguish it from the other "''republican''" parties his name was added. The new party failed to attract significant number of votes (0.9% during [[Czech legislative election, 2002]] was the highest). During [[Czech legislative election, 2006]] RMS joined the [[National Party (Czech Republic)|National Party]] which obtained 0.1% of votes. Number of active members is estimated to be dozens.<ref>[http://zpravy.idnes.cz/domaci.asp?r=domaci&c=A060319_081941_domaci_jan IDNES.cz]</ref> ==Ideology== RMS tries to continue in politics of '''SPR-RSČ''', whose main aims were following: * To reduce immigration into the [[Czech Republic]]. * To disband [[Senate of the Parliament of the Czech Republic]] in order to save money. * To keep education free of charge * To cancel a [[Progressive tax|Progressive income tax]] and introduce features of [[Direct democracy]] (such as direct presidential elections) * To support national pride in cultural life * They strongly criticised the [[European Union|EU]] and [[NATO]] and wanted to recover national sovereignty by leaving these organizations. * They are known for a very negative attitude towards ethnic minorities in the [[Czech Republic]] - especially [[Romani people|Roma]] population. ==References== <references/> ==External links== * [http://republikani.webnode.cz/ Party website] {{Cz}} [[Category:Antiziganism in the Czech Republic]] [[Category:Euroscepticism in the Czech Republic]] [[Category:Eurosceptic parties]] [[Category:Far-right political parties]] [[Category:Nationalist parties in the Czech Republic]] [[Category:Political parties in the Czech Republic]]
